## okta-admin idps createmsft

Adds a new Microsoft SSO IdP to your organization.

### Synopsis

Adds a new Microsoft SSO IdP to your organization.

```
okta-admin idps createmsft <name> <clientId> <clientSecret> [flags]
```

### Options

```

```
